Header: President's House Ceremonial Duties Handed over to Navy Troops
Content: The handover of ceremonial duties of the Sri Lanka Army  Corps of Military Police (SLACMP) at the President House â€“ Colombo to the Sri Lanka Navy took place formally on Tuesday (1) in a customary event. Army troops performed ceremonial guard duties at the President's House from 1 April 2019 to 29 September 2019 before it was changed.
